title: Weekly Roundup: Thursday, May 26
description: Donald Trump officially clinches the GOP nomination, and Hillary Clinton's emails won't go away.  Plus, a Trump/Sanders debate? This episode: host/campaign reporter Sam Sanders, congressional correspondent Susan Davis, campaign reporter Scott Detrow, and national political correspondent Mara Liasson. More coverage at nprpolitics.org. Email the show at nprpolitics@npr.org.
